sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_0fcb9b14db2a8300db45bff0ef9619cf
sys_update_xml.payload: c$pe-light-theme-header: #222 !default; $pe-dark-theme-header: #fff !default; $pe-dracula-theme-header: #bd93f9 !default; $pe-sub-header-color: #777 !default; $pe-anchor-color: #03a9f4 !default; $pe-font-size: 1.5rem !default; .blog-container { font-family: 'Whitney SSm A', 'Whitney SSm B', 'Lato', 'Lucida Grande', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', Tahoma, Sans-Serif; margin: 0 auto; max-width: 700px; .blog-post { display: block; margin-bottom: 4rem; padding: 0; &:last-child { border-bottom: none; } article { margin-bottom: 20px; padding: 0 20px; h1 { font-size: 3.5rem; font-weight: 700; text-transform: capitalize; } h2 { color: $pe-sub-header-color; font-size: $pe-font-size; font-weight: bold; } a { cursor: pointer; } .blog-info { margin: 20px 0; } .s1 { font-size: $pe-font-size; } .rating { float: right; margin-left: 5px; } .author { font-weight: bold; } } .tags { margin-bottom: 0; padding: 0.4rem 2rem 0.5rem; i { margin-right: 0.1rem; } .edit-entry { float: right; } } } .dark-theme { a { color: $pe-anchor-color; &:hover { color: lighten($pe-anchor-color, 30%); } } color: #e5e5e5; background-color: #3a3939; h1 { color: $pe-dark-theme-header; &:hover { color: $pe-anchor-color; } } .blog-info { color: #888; } .rating { color: #888; } .tags { background-color: #302f2f; color: #888; } } .dracula-theme { a { color: #8be9fd; &:hover { color: #fff; } } color: #f8f8f2; background-color: #282a36; h1 { color: $pe-dracula-theme-header; &:hover { color: #6272a4; } } .blog-info { color: #6272a4; } .rating { color: #6272a4; } .tags { background-color: #44475a; color: #bd93f9; } } .light-theme { a { color: $pe-anchor-color; &:hover { color: #222; } } color: #222; background-color: #f9f9f9; h1 { color: $pe-light-theme-header; &:hover { color: $pe-anchor-color; } } .blog-info { color: #888; } .rating { color: #888; } .tags { background-color: #e9e9e9; } } } u_sp_blog_instanceu_category,u_max_entries,u_excerpt_character_limit,u_theme,u_edit_role,u_excerpt,u_ratingsfalsepe-blogfalsePE Blogfalsefalsesp_widgetadmin2017-11-16 19:34:030fcb9b14db2a8300db45bff0ef9619cf28PE Blogglobalglobalsp_widget_0fcb9b14db2a8300db45bff0ef9619cfadmin2017-11-16 23:49:56
